thread.title: BRIEF-Markor And Units Acquire Stakes In M.U.S.T. Holdings And Rowe Fine Furniture

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Markor And Units Acquire Stakes In M.U.S.T. Holdings And Rowe Fine Furniture

organizations.name: markor international home furnishings co ltd

text:
January 7, 2018 / 10:26 AM / Updated 9 hours ago BRIEF-Markor And Units Acquire Stakes In M.U.S.T. Holdings And Rowe Fine Furniture Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Jan 7 (Reuters) - Markor International Home Furnishings Co Ltd: 
* SAYS IT AND UNITS ACQUIRE STAKES IN TWO FOREIGN FIRMS M.U.S.T. HOLDINGS LIMITED AND ROWE FINE FURNITURE HOLDING CORP TOTALLING $29.92 MILLION Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2ABFsEe Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
